title: I scored 7/40 in mechanical in isa 2 and 9/40 in isa 1 . Will i have to write backlog paper now

comments.body: yeah dude mechanical in chem cycle üëè

Yeah enjoy backlogs üëç  
Or get like really good in ESAs, we still got time grind it
U have 8 marks for 40 and for assignment let's say u got atleast 8 u have 16 then ull need 48+ that's like 50+ and ull pass dw no backlog
"enjoy backlogs" blud sit down , who knows who would be laughing in the end. That was a unnecessary comment

Many people fuck up mechanical don't give up and study well for the esa
U should pass with a bit of luck and regularisation

mech ESA's are pretty easy tbh,just mug up slides and you should be good to go.  
Don't worry,you have to time to ace it!

Also they go 9-10 for the internals part so you need not worry too much
Mech was pretty I had it 2 years back it was the last exam, was irritated and scribbled something thinking i will get a B got fuckin A somehow so chill
You can make up in the ESA but be thoroughly prepared for it. Also try to score in Assignments.
